item.title: Buy
item.dc:creator: idxhome
item.content:encoded:
[column large="6"] [/column][column large="6"]

Why Buy With Us?

We are your partners through the entire buying process – after all, this is the most important purchase you’ll ever make! Our team has the experience, knowledge and technology to help you find what you’re looking for. Our custom-built home-search website pulls directly from the MLS and can send updates immediately to our buyers when a new home is listed or a current home changes its price, so you’re the first to know. Call today to find out why we are your first choice for buying your next home! [/column]
[row] [column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-home" size="25"] Homes For Sale

Search for homes based on characteristics, price, amenities, location and more!
[button size="large" url="https://idx-firstimpression.idxbroker.com/idx/search/advanced"]Property Search[/button]

[icon icon="fa-money-bill" size="25"] Pre-Approval

A pre-approval letter is one of the most crucial items needed to purchase a house! It shows you’re a serious buyer and can afford the home you are submitting an offer for. Once you connect with our team, we can recommend local lenders who have proven affordable, reliable and trustworthy.

[icon icon="fa-dollar-sign" size="25"] Escrow and Closing Costs

When you purchase a home, there will be closing costs which include fees for processing, title insurance, closing, title search, mortgage taxes, appraisals, and more. Within closing costs, there are third-party fees that come from companies that don’t work for mortgage lenders yet provide essential services like escrow. Escrow is when an impartial third party holds on to funds and distributes them accordingly to process a transaction. This fund, also known as earnest money, is a form of good faith that the buyer will hold for the seller if they breech the contract. Please consult an attorney if you have a question.

[icon icon="fa-shield-alt" size="25"] Home Warranty

Buying a home is one of the biggest financial investments you will ever make. A home warranty protects you, the buyer, (for the first year) from damages to certain mechanical and appliance systems in the home. We know what to look out for and how to negotiate this into the deal for our buyers. [/column] [column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-compass" size="25"] Relocation

Are you looking to relocate to our beautiful city? Need more information to help you find the right area and neighborhood for your family?
[button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/contact/" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]Contact Us[/button]

[icon icon="fa-flag-checkered" size="25"] First-Time Buyers

First time buying a home? Don’t worry – our team is able to take you through the entire process from start to finish. There are many first-time home buyer programs and lending options. We’re happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction.

[icon icon="fa-moon" size="25"] Seniors

We're proud to help seniors find a place for their needs. There are many single-floor living options in our area which suit the needs of Seniors. We know transitioning to a new residence and environment can be challenging, but we are here every step of the way - from preparing the home for sale, to finding the next home.

[icon icon="fa-truck" size="25"] Moving Van

We can help! You can count on us to recommend local moving companies to assist when you move in. When you work with us, you won’t have to find much on your own – we’re happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. [/column] [/row]

large="6"] [/column][column large="6"]

Why Buy With Us?

We are your partners through the entire buying process – after all, this is the most important purchase you’ll ever make! Our team has the experience, knowledge and technology to help you find what you’re looking for. Our custom-built home-search website pulls directly from the MLS and can send updates immediately to our buyers when a new home is listed or a current home changes its price, so you’re the first to know. Call today to find out why we are your first choice for buying your next home! [/column]
[row] [column large="6"] [icon icon="fa-home" size="25"]

Homes For Sale

Search for homes based on characteristics, price, amenities, location and more!
[button size="large" url="https://idx-firstimpression.idxbroker.com/idx/search/advanced"]Property Search[/button]
[icon icon="fa-money" size="25"]

Pre-Approval

A pre-approval letter is one of the most crucial items needed to purchase a house! It shows you’re a serious buyer and can afford the home you are submitting an offer for. Once you connect with our team, we can recommend local lenders who have proven affordable, reliable and trustworthy. [icon icon="fa-usd" size="25"]

Escrow and Closing Costs

When you purchase a home, there will be closing costs which include fees for processing, title insurance, closing, title search, mortgage taxes, appraisals, and more. Within closing costs, there are third-party fees that come from companies that don’t work for mortgage lenders yet provide essential services like escrow. Escrow is when an impartial third party holds on to funds and distributes them accordingly to process a transaction. This fund, also known as earnest money, is a form of good faith that the buyer will hold for the seller if they breech the contract. Please consult an attorney if you have a question. [icon icon="fa-shield" size="25"]

Home Warranty

Buying a home is one of the biggest financial investments you will ever make. A home warranty protects you, the buyer, (for the first year) from damages to certain mechanical and appliance systems in the home. We know what to look out for and how to negotiate this into the deal for our buyers. [/column] [column large="6"] [icon icon="fa-compass" size="25"]

Relocation

Are you looking to relocate to our beautiful city? Need more information to help you find the right area and neighborhood for your family?
[button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/contact" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]Contact Us[/button]
[icon icon="fa-flag-checkered" size="25"]

First-Time Buyers

First time buying a home? Don’t worry – our team is able to take you through the entire process from start to finish. There are many first-time home buyer programs and lending options. We’re happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. [icon icon="fa-moon-o" size="25"]

Seniors

We're proud to help seniors find a place for their needs. There are many single-floor living options in our area which suit the needs of Seniors. We know transitioning to a new residence and environment can be challenging, but we are here every step of the way - from preparing the home for sale, to finding the next home. [icon icon="fa-truck" size="25"]

Moving Van

We can help! You can count on us to recommend local moving companies to assist when you move in. When you work with us, you won’t have to find much on your own – we’re happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. [/column] large="6"] [/column][column large="6"]

Why Buy With Us?

We are your partners through the entire buying process – after all, this is the most important purchase you’ll ever make! Our team has the experience, knowledge and technology to help you find what you’re looking for. Our custom-built home-search website pulls directly from the MLS and can send updates immediately to our buyers when a new home is listed or a current home changes its price, so you’re the first to know. Call today to find out why we are your first choice for buying your next home! [/column]
[row] [column large="6"] [icon icon="fa-home" size="25"]

Homes For Sale

Search for homes based on characteristics, price, amenities, location and more!
[button size="large" url="https://idx-firstimpression.idxbroker.com/idx/search/advanced"]Property Search[/button]
[icon icon="fa-money" size="25"]

Pre-Approval

A pre-approval letter is one of the most crucial items needed to purchase a house! It shows you’re a serious buyer and can afford the home you are submitting an offer for. Once you connect with our team, we can recommend local lenders who have proven affordable, reliable and trustworthy. [icon icon="fa-usd" size="25"]

Escrow and Closing Costs

When you purchase a home, there will be closing costs which include fees for processing, title insurance, closing, title search, mortgage taxes, appraisals, and more. Within closing costs, there are third-party fees that come from companies that don’t work for mortgage lenders yet provide essential services like escrow. Escrow is when an impartial third party holds on to funds and distributes them accordingly to process a transaction. This fund, also known as earnest money, is a form of good faith that the buyer will hold for the seller if they breech the contract. Please consult an attorney if you have a question. [icon icon="fa-shield" size="25"]

Home Warranty

Buying a home is one of the biggest financial investments you will ever make. A home warranty protects you, the buyer, (for the first year) from damages to certain mechanical and appliance systems in the home. We know what to look out for and how to negotiate this into the deal for our buyers. [/column] [column large="6"] [icon icon="fa-compass" size="25"]

Relocation

Are you looking to relocate to our beautiful city? Need more information to help you find the right area and neighborhood for your family?
[button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/contact" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]Contact Us[/button]
[icon icon="fa-flag-checkered" size="25"]

First-Time Buyers

First time buying a home? Don’t worry – our team is able to take you through the entire process from start to finish. There are many first-time home buyer programs and lending options. We’re happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. [icon icon="fa-moon-o" size="25"]

Seniors

We're proud to help seniors find a place for their needs. There are many single-floor living options in our area which suit the needs of Seniors. We know transitioning to a new residence and environment can be challenging, but we are here every step of the way - from preparing the home for sale, to finding the next home. [icon icon="fa-truck" size="25"]

Moving Van

We can help! You can count on us to recommend local moving companies to assist when you move in. When you work with us, you won’t have to find much on your own – we’re happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. [/column] large="6"] [/column][column large="6"]

Why Buy With Us?

We are your partners through the entire buying process – after all, this is the most important purchase you’ll ever make! Our team has the experience, knowledge and technology to help you find what you’re looking for. Our custom-built home-search website pulls directly from the MLS and can send updates immediately to our buyers when a new home is listed or a current home changes its price, so you’re the first to know. Call today to find out why we are your first choice for buying your next home! [/column]
[row] [column large="6"] [icon icon="fa-home" size="25"]

Homes For Sale

Search for homes based on characteristics, price, amenities, location and more!
[button size="large" url="https://idx-firstimpression.idxbroker.com/idx/search/advanced"]Property Search[/button]
[icon icon="fa-money" size="25"]

Pre-Approval

A pre-approval letter is one of the most crucial items needed to purchase a house! It shows you’re a serious buyer and can afford the home you are submitting an offer for. Once you connect with our team, we can recommend local lenders who have proven affordable, reliable and trustworthy. [icon icon="fa-usd" size="25"]

Escrow and Closing Costs

When you purchase a home, there will be closing costs which include fees for processing, title insurance, closing, title search, mortgage taxes, appraisals, and more. Within closing costs, there are third-party fees that come from companies that don’t work for mortgage lenders yet provide essential services like escrow. Escrow is when an impartial third party holds on to funds and distributes them accordingly to process a transaction. This fund, also known as earnest money, is a form of good faith that the buyer will hold for the seller if they breech the contract. Please consult an attorney if you have a question. [icon icon="fa-shield" size="25"]

Home Warranty

Buying a home is one of the biggest financial investments you will ever make. A home warranty protects you, the buyer, (for the first year) from damages to certain mechanical and appliance systems in the home. We know what to look out for and how to negotiate this into the deal for our buyers. [/column] [column large="6"] [icon icon="fa-compass" size="25"]

Relocation

Are you looking to relocate to our beautiful city? Need more information to help you find the right area and neighborhood for your family?
[button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/contact" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]Contact Us[/button]
[icon icon="fa-flag-checkered" size="25"]

First-Time Buyers

First time buying a home? Don’t worry – our team is able to take you through the entire process from start to finish. There are many first-time home buyer programs and lending options. We’re happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. [icon icon="fa-moon-o" size="25"]

Seniors

We're proud to help seniors find a place for their needs. There are many single-floor living options in our area which suit the needs of Seniors. We know transitioning to a new residence and environment can be challenging, but we are here every step of the way - from preparing the home for sale, to finding the next home. [icon icon="fa-truck" size="25"]

Moving Van

We can help! You can count on us to recommend local moving companies to assist when you move in. When you work with us, you won’t have to find much on your own – we’re happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. [/column] item.title: Sell
item.dc:creator: idxhome
item.content:encoded:
[column large="6"] [/column][column large="6"]

Why Sell With Us?

Choosing who to work with is one of the most important questions you'll ask yourself when selling a home.
Choose our team! We know what buyers are looking for and we know our community. We know the area, not only because we live and work here, but also because we grew up here and are involved. With several combined years of experience and community involvement, our reputation speaks for itself! [/column]
[row]
[column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-image" size="25"] Marketing Your Home

We don't simply put a sign in your yard and wait for others to sell. We specialize in creating demand for your home.
Selling a home takes a well thought out game plan. We have just that ready to list your home.
[button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/sell/marketing-your-home/" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]View Our Marketing Plan[/button]

[icon icon="fa-money-bill" size="25"] What's Your Home Worth?

Not sure if this is a good time to sell? Wonder how much you could get for your home? Let us create a comparative market analysis for your home to answer those questions and more.
[button url="https://idx-firstimpression.idxbroker.com/idx/homevaluation" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]Request a Report[/button]
[/column]
[column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-dollar-sign" size="25"] Escrow and Closing Costs

When you purchase a home, there will be closing costs. These costs include fees for processing, title insurance, closing, title search, mortgage taxes, appraisals, and more. Within closing costs, there are third-party fees that come from companies that don't work for mortgage lenders yet provide essential services like escrow.
Escrow is when an impartial third party holds on to funds and distributes them accordingly to process a transaction. This fund, also known as earnest money, is a form of good faith that the buyer will hold for the seller if they breech the contract. Please consult an attorney if you have a question.

[icon icon="fa-truck" size="25"] Moving Van

We can help! You can count on us to recommend local moving companies to assist when you move. When you work with us, you won't have to find much on your own – we're happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction.
[/column]
[/row]

Why Sell With Us?

Choosing who to work with is one of the most important questions you'll ask yourself when selling a home. Choose our team! We know what buyers are looking for and we know our community. We know the area, not only because we live and work here, but also because we grew up here and are involved. With several combined years of experience and community involvement, our reputation speaks for itself!
[row] [column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-picture-o" size="25"] Marketing Your Home

We don't simply put a sign in your yard and wait for others to sell. We specialize in creating demand for your home. Selling a home takes a well thought out game plan. We have just that ready to list your home. [button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/sell/marketing-your-home/" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]View Our Marketing Plan[/button]

[icon icon="fa-money" size="25"] What's Your Home Worth?

Not sure if this is a good time to sell? Wonder how much you could get for your home? Let us create a comparative market analysis for your home to answer those questions and more. [button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/sell/whats-home-worth/" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]Request a Report[/button] [/column] [column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-usd" size="25"] Escrow and Closing Costs

When you purchase a home, there will be closing costs. These costs include fees for processing, title insurance, closing, title search, mortgage taxes, appraisals, and more. Within closing costs, there are third-party fees that come from companies that don't work for mortgage lenders yet provide essential services like escrow. Escrow is when an impartial third party holds on to funds and distributes them accordingly to process a transaction. This fund, also known as earnest money, is a form of good faith that the buyer will hold for the seller if they breech the contract. Please consult an attorney if you have a question.

[icon icon="fa-truck" size="25"] Moving Van

We can help! You can count on us to recommend local moving companies to assist when you move. When you work with us, you won't have to find much on your own – we're happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. [/column] Why Sell With Us?

Choosing who to work with is one of the most important questions you'll ask yourself when selling a home. Choose our team! We know what buyers are looking for and we know our community. We know the area, not only because we live and work here, but also because we grew up here and are involved. With several combined years of experience and community involvement, our reputation speaks for itself!
[row] [column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-picture-o" size="25"] Marketing Your Home

We don't simply put a sign in your yard and wait for others to sell. We specialize in creating demand for your home. Selling a home takes a well thought out game plan. We have just that ready to list your home. [button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/sell/marketing-your-home/" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]View Our Marketing Plan[/button]

[icon icon="fa-money" size="25"] What's Your Home Worth?

Not sure if this is a good time to sell? Wonder how much you could get for your home? Let us create a comparative market analysis for your home to answer those questions and more. [button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/sell/whats-home-worth/" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]Request a Report[/button] [/column] [column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-usd" size="25"] Escrow and Closing Costs

When you purchase a home, there will be closing costs. These costs include fees for processing, title insurance, closing, title search, mortgage taxes, appraisals, and more. Within closing costs, there are third-party fees that come from companies that don't work for mortgage lenders yet provide essential services like escrow. Escrow is when an impartial third party holds on to funds and distributes them accordingly to process a transaction. This fund, also known as earnest money, is a form of good faith that the buyer will hold for the seller if they breech the contract. Please consult an attorney if you have a question.

[icon icon="fa-truck" size="25"] Moving Van

We can help! You can count on us to recommend local moving companies to assist when you move. When you work with us, you won't have to find much on your own – we're happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. [/column] [icon icon="fa-usd" size="25"] Escrow and Closing Costs

When you purchase a home, there will be closing costs. These costs include fees for processing, title insurance, closing, title search, mortgage taxes, appraisals, and more. Within closing costs, there are third-party fees that come from companies that don't work for mortgage lenders yet provide essential services like escrow. Escrow is when an impartial third party holds on to funds and distributes them accordingly to process a transaction. This fund, also known as earnest money, is a form of good faith that the buyer will hold for the seller if they breech the contract. Please consult an attorney if you have a question.

[icon icon="fa-truck" size="25"] Moving Van

We can help! You can count on us to recommend local moving companies to assist when you move. When you work with us, you won't have to find much on your own – we're happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction. Why Sell With Us?

Choosing who to work with is one of the most important questions you'll ask yourself when selling a home. Choose our team! We know what buyers are looking for and we know our community. We know the area, not only because we live and work here, but also because we grew up here and are involved. With several combined years of experience and community involvement, our reputation speaks for itself!

Why Sell With Us?

Choosing who to work with is one of the most important questions you'll ask yourself when selling a home. Choose our team! We know what buyers are looking for and we know our community. We know the area, not only because we live and work here, but also because we grew up here and are involved. With several combined years of experience and community involvement, our reputation speaks for itself!
[row] [column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-picture-o" size="25"] Marketing Your Home

We don't simply put a sign in your yard and wait for others to sell. We specialize in creating demand for your home. Selling a home takes a well thought out game plan. We have just that ready to list your home. [button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/sell/marketing-your-home/" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]View Our Marketing Plan[/button]

[icon icon="fa-money" size="25"] What's Your Home Worth?

Not sure if this is a good time to sell? Wonder how much you could get for your home? Let us create a comparative market analysis for your home to answer those questions and more. [button url="https://idx-firstimpression.homewithidxbroker.com/sell/whats-home-worth/" block="1" size="large" color="alt"]Request a Report[/button] [/column] [column large="6"]

[icon icon="fa-usd" size="25"] Escrow and Closing Costs

When you purchase a home, there will be closing costs. These costs include fees for processing, title insurance, closing, title search, mortgage taxes, appraisals, and more. Within closing costs, there are third-party fees that come from companies that don't work for mortgage lenders yet provide essential services like escrow. Escrow is when an impartial third party holds on to funds and distributes them accordingly to process a transaction. This fund, also known as earnest money, is a form of good faith that the buyer will hold for the seller if they breech the contract. Please consult an attorney if you have a question.

[icon icon="fa-truck" size="25"] Moving Van

We can help! You can count on us to recommend local moving companies to assist when you move. When you work with us, you won't have to find much on your own – we're happy to make recommendations and point you in the right direction.
